Innovators’ Challenge

Innovators’ Challenge

VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation is excited to announce a brand new event for 2018 – the inaugural Innovators’ Challenge. The event will bring together the brightest and most promising entrepreneurs and innovators from across BC, including those in biotech, life sciences and high tech industries. Together, they will raise funds in support of Vancouver Coastal Health’s innovation agenda, while being given rare, early access to tomorrow’s breakthrough medical device.

The evening will start with a reception, providing an opportunity for attendees to mingle with like-minded innovators with a passion for health care. Guests will then be led into an auditorium to witness presentations from leading BC-based clinician scientists who will each showcase an idea for an innovative medical device. Guests can then make important philanthropic donations to help propel these ideas forward knowing they are having a direct impact on the health of British Columbians. They will then have the opportunity to meet the presenters and their teams after the event, to learn more about the vital role that innovation plays in transforming health care across the province. During the evening, the inaugural Lifetime Achievement in Health Innovation Award will be presented.

Event details:

Date: Monday, April 9, 2018
Location: Vancity Theatre, 1181 Seymour Street, Vancouver
*More details to follow in the coming weeks

Presented by:

In partnership with:

Get Involved:

  • For Sponsorship inquiries, please contact: Rebecca Sharma or 604 875 4676 ext 66379
  • For additional information about the event, please contact: Nicola Harper or 604 875 4676 ext 66295

Lifetime Achievement in Health Innovation Award

 

The new Lifetime Achievement in Health Innovation Award, presented by VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation, has been created to recognize the exceptional capabilities, achievements and leadership of an individual from the medical device, biotech, diagnostics and/or health care industries.

The first Award will be presented to the winner at the inaugural Innovators’ Challenge event on April 9.

Innovators’ Challenge Advisory Committee

Paul Geyer (Chair)

CEO of Discovery Parks and Nimbus Synergies, a unique Health Technology Program under the Discovery Parks umbrella

Co-Director, ICICS, UBC; Director, HATCH Incubator, VCHRI; Director, Surgical Technologies Lab, VCHRI
